root.name: Cooking Mama: Cook Off
root.description: OverviewCooking Mama: Cook Off is a cooking simulator in which you use the Wii's motion controls to prepare various dishes, as well as deserts which were not present in the previous Cooking Mama. The Wii Remote is used to imitate various gestures such as stirring and chopping. Cooking Mama: Cook Off has 55 recipes and over 300 ingredients. The dishes you can make come from various countries as well.
